title: Resume Formatting Services for a Leading Staffing & Recruitment Company

content.title: Our Objective
content.data: A leading staffing and recruitment company approached Computyne with a recurring challenge-managing thousands of resumes daily while ensuring they are clean, consistent, and recruiter-friendly. Their in-house team was spending hours fixing formatting issues instead of focusing on what matters most: connecting top talent with the right employers.

content.title: Challenges We Faced
content.subLine: The client needed a scalable, reliable, and cost-effective resume formatting solution to streamline their recruitment workflow.
data: High volume of resumes arriving in multiple formats (Word, PDF, scanned copies, etc.)
Inconsistent layouts and formatting making it difficult for recruiters to evaluate quickly
Time-consuming manual efforts by the internal team
Slowed-down hiring process due to formatting delays

content.title: Results Achieved
data: 60% faster resume turnaround time
99.5% accuracy in formatted resumes
Recruitment team saved hundreds of hours monthly
Improved candidate presentation leading to better client satisfaction

content.title: Why Choose Computyne?
content.subLine: By outsourcing resume formatting to Computyne, the client gained:
data: A scalable back-office support system
Cost savings compared to in-house manual formatting
More time for recruiters to focus on hiring and client relationships
Consistent branding across all candidate resumes

clientWords.data: Computyne has completely transformed the way we manage resumes. Their team is fast, reliable, and ensures every document is recruiter-ready. We can now focus on building relationships with candidates and clients instead of worrying about formatting.
